name: Marvin (imasnyper)
description:
You play as Marvin, a maple key on a journey to repolate the planet with trees! take control of the wind with your L/R arrow keys to send wind gusts to help Marvin avoid tree limbs. Up/Down arrow keys speed up or slow down how fast Marvin is falling. (WASD can be used instead).

Z and X (or Q and E) can be used to rotate Marvin to squeeze through any tight gaps.

Be careful! Don’t fall to fast or slow, if Marvin goes off the top or bottom, it’s game over!

How many branches can you populate?
